mapper.select: SELECT STUNO, NAME, SUBSTR(ID,1,LENGTH(ID)-3) || '***' AS ID, GRADE, SUBSTR(JUMIN, 1, 6) || '-' || SUBSTR(JUMIN, 7, 1) || '******' AS JUMIN FROM STU

select STUNO, S.NAME, D2.DNAME AS COLLEGE, D1.DNAME AS DEPT, P.NAME AS PROFNAME from stu s inner join department d1 on s.deptno1 = d1.deptno inner join department d2 on d1.part = d2.deptno inner join professor p on s.profno = p.profno WHERE STUNO = #{stuNo}
SELECT STUNO, NAME, ID, GRADE FROM STU WHERE STUNO = #{stuNo}
